1-name: Erin Dapper, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication with Business Studies, University of Brighton
1-alt: A computer generated woman wearing a dark green top and trousers stands with one hand on her hip looking upwards. In the background there is a virtual beach and mountains. To the left of the woman, there are computer generated 3D shapes that appear like falling rubble.
2-name: Shannon McGowan, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, Birmingham City University
2-alt: Black and grey computer generated Clo3D image of a man wearing a baseball cap, sunglasses and a sports jacket facing towards the camera with only his torso and head visible. Two copies of the same man are in the background behind the shoulders of the first man.
3-name: Sophie Parnaby, BA (Hons) Fashion Design and Technology, Manchester Metropolitan University
3-alt: A woman's body is pictured in side profile view wearing a black, futuristic 3D printed dress embellished with feather and wing like shapes. Blurred out yellow flowers are shown on the left hand side of the image.
4-name: Mark Chapman, BA (Hons) Fashion, Manchester Metropolitan University
4-alt: Pictured are pencil sketches of four different male models walking towards the camera, overlayed with different blue and black clothing. Underneath the feet of the models are strips of different fabrics.
5-name: Elza Mucina, BA (Hons) Fashion Marketing and Promotion, University of Westminster
5-alt: A photo of a woman wearing a stone coloured polo neck jumper and dark sunglasses looks directly at the camera while wraping her arm over her head and over the opposite ear. A man wearing a grey v neck sweater and grey blazer jacket stands slightly behind her right shoulder, with one hand over one eye. The photo is placed over a larger, blurred out version of the same photo, but on the larger version the woman's face is covered with light brown coloured geometric lines to resemble a mask.
6-name: Karolina Najdek, BA (Hons) Fashion, University of Northampton
6-alt: A large, white statue of a woman pointing with one hand stands on a white circle platform in the middle of a sandy landscape. The statue is clothed with a white shirt and silver, high waisted, flared trousers. In front of the statue is an opaque, half cylinder shape floating in mid air.
7-name: Charlotte Ireland, BA (Hons) Fashion Marketing, University of Leeds
7-alt: On a white background, orange letters are spaced out in a curved orientation in three rows.
8-name: Paige Allison, BA (Hons) Fashion Marketing & Retail Design, University of South Wales
8-alt: Half of the photo is of a white background, the upper half is black with drips running down onto the white lower half. The words 'we. the originals' are pictured in black font in white boxes on the black half of the picture.
9-name: Poppy Wright, BA (Hons) Fashion Promotion, Ravensbourne
9-alt: Pictured is a woman in side profile looking at the camera, wearing a shiny, blue blazer with a white and black chequered collar and pink lapel. The woman stands under a crinkled, purple and green toned see-through piece of fabric.
10-name: Megan Walker, BA (Hons) Fashion Media, Southampton Solent University
10-alt: In front of a pastal purple background, a woman stands diagonal to the camera looking up to the top left corner with only her torso and head in shot. She wears a dark black cape made of large black feathers, with tufts of black feathers sprouting from her face and head.
11-name: Sanna Karjalainen, BA (Hons) Fashion and Textile Design, University of Portsmouth
11-alt: Four young adults pose in front of a brick wall. Two of them wear pastal toned face makeup and bobbled, misshapped jumpers in pastal pinks, yellows and turquoise. The adult in the middle at the back wears a head scarf so only his eyes are visible, wearing an oversized, pastal pink sweater with an abstract line drawing of a person's face on the front. To his right, a woman stands wearing a dark beanie hat looking directly at the camera, dressed in an oversized, yellow and black outdoor coat.
12-name: Molly Huntingdon, BA (Hons) Fashion and Textile Design, University of Portsmouth
12-alt: A sepia toned photo of a young woman with dark red hair leaning on a surface with one hand behind her ear. She is wearing yellow clothing with a white lace vale resting on the back of her head.
13-name: Isabelle Dance, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, Greater Brighton Metropolitan College
13-alt: Six cartoon drawings of women all dressed in different outfits, with a line of coloured dots below. At the bottom of the image, virutal images of fabric strips are pictured.
14-name: Marcela Lojan Yepez, BA (Hons) Fashion, Southampton Solent University
14-alt: A woman stands looking directly at the camera with a beach scene behind. She is wearing a blue and orange outfit designed in the style of ocean coral.
15-name: Alice Riley, BA (Hons) Fashion Knitwear and Knitted Textiles, Nottingham Trent University
15-alt: Photo of a scrapbook page with a white background, black and white phtoos of a man covered with cut out strips of grey, black and blue fabric and material. In the background there is a faded, grey toned photograph of an industrial style building.
16-name: Amy Paske, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication and Promotion, Norwich University of the Arts
16-alt: A black and white photo of the back of a man reaching with both hands for the back of his head. Black dash marks line down the side of the right hand edge of the photo. A black circle and two thick dash marks are near the bottom left hand corner of the photo.
17-name: Tessa Dykes, BA (Hons) Fashion, Norwich University of the Arts
17-alt: A woman wearing a sleeveless, full length black dress with black and bright pink hair looks down at the floor while spinning around. The background resembles old parchment paper.
18-name: Carlota Beatriz Lopez de Carvalho Pimentel dos Santos, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication and Promotion, Nottingham Trent University
18-alt: In front of a birght green background, five white, opaque letters in surrelist font are positioned in all four corners and the centre of the photo.
19-name: Hollie-Mae Homan, BA (Hons) Fashion Branding and Communication, Arts University Bournemouth
19-alt: On top of a white background, words in blue ink are printed over each other as well as blue ink splatters. In the bottom of the photo, an image of two forms in blue ink are shown, next to an image of modern bookcase shevles. Near the top of the photo, an image of cream card with blue ink splatters on it is depicted.
20-name: Shion Sasahara, BA (Hons) Fashion Promotion and Imaging, UCA Epsom
20-alt: On a white background there is a beige uneven circle pictured slightly right of centre. Over the circle there are two rows of dark olive green coloured letters with white characters underneath. In the bottom left hand corner there is a watercolour painting of a eucalyptus branch in front of the white background.
21-name: Abigail Millen, BA (Hons) Fashion, UCA Epsom
21-alt: A woman facing the camera stands wearing a blue shirt under a misshaped suit jumpsuit with one hand in her pocket and the other resting on her head. To her right, another woman stands side on to the camera, wearing a misshaped yellow shirt and black skirt.
22-name: Georgina Collison, BA (Hons) Fashion, UCA Epsom
22-alt: A manequin wearing a bright orange dress with excessive folds of fabric on one side is positioned in front of a dark green bush during the daytime
23-name: Kit Bacon, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication, University of the West of England
23-alt: On a white surface in front of a white backdrop a black and white book is pictured lying flat. On the cover of the book there is an image of a woman's head. The woman is looking forward with her hair tied up into a bun. Over the image of the woman black writing in an illegible, jittery font is pictured.
24-name: Phoebe Wilkinson, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication, University of the West of England
24-alt: A bright floppy sunhat in front of a dark green bush, with a dark black wig underneath the hat floating in mid air.
25-name: Yuan Qiu, BA (Hons) Fashion Marketing and Promotion, University of Westminster
25-alt: Five square, black and white photos of a young woman wearing a baseball cap and a white sweatshirt in different positions are pictured at the bottom of the photo in two rows. The first row contains three pictures, the second row contains two pictures. Above these pictures, there is a larger polaroid photo of the same woman but in colour, with the woman standing and looking directly at the camera. Behind the polarid photo is rough brushstroke marks of orange paint.
26-name: Cressida Drummond-Hill, BA (Hons) Fashion Communication with Business Studies, University of Brighton
26-alt: A young man wearing jeans and a caramel coat over a red hoodie stands sideways, looking into a camera positioned on a tripod. In the background, there are disant hills, old stone houses and a dry stone wall. The man stands on a gravel path by a road in front of the dry stone wall.
27-name: Maria Monterio, BA (Hons) Fashion Branding and Communication, Arts University Bournemouth
27-alt: In front of a white background, various open books are layed out with the pages visible. The books are black, red and yellow in colour, with cartoon images of mouths on the pages and black speach bubbles with yellow writing. Large, yellow writing in casual script fonts are pictured on the pages.
28-name: Autumn West, BA (Hons) Fashion Management & Communication, Sheffield Hallam University
28-alt: A man wearing a waterproof, orange zip up jacket, light blue jeans and a black beanie hat is pictured standing, looking directly at the camera. With his right hand the young man is thowing a multi coloured basketball towards the camera. In the background, a basket ball court and houses are visible.
29-name: Rebecca Williams, BA (Hons) Fashion Management & Communication, Sheffield Hallam University
29-alt: The upper half of a woman's face is pictured from above with her long hair spread out and her eyes closed. In her hair there are different, brightly coloured butterflies of different sizes.
30-name: Charlotte Penny-Slinn, BA (Hons) Fashion Business and Promotion, Birmingham City University
30-alt: Three, computer generated images of the same woman wearing a short sleeve, green jumpsuit are pictured, one facing the camera, the other two positioned diagonal to the camera. Behind the figures of the woman there is a night sky and virutal mountain range which is pink with sunlight. Behind the mountain range is a reddy pink and orange ombre square and three copies of the same planet in different sizes. In front of the mountain range and underweath the women's feet is a black tiled floor with neon purple lines.
31-name: Madeline McKenna, BA (Hons) Fashion, Coventry University
31-alt: A close up shot of a pair of blue and black modular headphones which are suspended by its wire from above in front of a white background.
32-name: Anna Vanova, BA (Hons) Fashion Promotion, University of South Wales
32-alt: In front of a bright green background, the impression of a globe shape is pictured, made up of black text saying CYKLUS repeatedly.
33-name: Amy White, BA (Hons) Fashion, University of Northampton
33-alt: In front of a white background, two abstract line drawings of two people sitting down are pictured. The figure on the left is holding up a abstract image of a cream patterened mug on top of a red plate, The figure to the right is reaching out to take the mug, with an image of a dress made out of brown fabric placed over the line drawing.
34-name: Alicia Dalton, BA (Hons) Fashion Media & Marketing, Plymouth College of Art
34-alt: An electronic bus stop poster is pictured positioned parallel to the camera with a blurry street scene behind. On the electronic street poster, a young woman wearing an opaque dress made from black flowers is pictured standing sideways.Behind the woman there is blurred images of dark green foliage with some leaves and branches in focus. In front of the woman black text is overlayed saying 'Rent 'Mqueen'
35-name: Veronika Hadjistefanou, BA (Hons) Fashion, Kingston University
35-alt: In front of a black backgrounnd, the upper body and head of a woman is pictured, with the woman turning her head away from the camera to look over her shoulder and leaning backwards. She is wearing a white, futuristic dress with high shoulder pads and a ribbed design.
36-name: Francesca Harvey, BA (Hons) Fashion, Kingston University
36-alt: In front of a white background, four figures are pictured stood facing the camera in a line.The figure on the furthest right and the figure on the furthest left have their hands on the shoulders on the figures directly next to them. All four figures are wearing outfits made out of black and high vis orange outfits with some part of their faces covered by high neck jakets, hoods or masks. The figures stand in front of white tepee structures which have orange and black material inside them.
37-name: Melina Rai, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, UCA Rochester
37-alt: Six copies of a draw of the same model are pictured standing in a line facing the camera. Each copy of the model is shown wearing a different, futuristic outfit of steel, light pink and cream colours
38-name: Xinyi Lu, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, UCA Rochester
38-alt: An abstract drawing of a woman with dark, straight, short hair is pictured, wearing an abstract dress with heavily ruffled skirt and shoulder pads. A faded, green toned copy of the abstract image of the woman is repeated behind the first one.
39-name: Aiyeesha Hanif, BA (Hons) Fashion Atelier, UCA Rochester
39-alt: A dark figure is pictured standing side on in a dark room, with electric blue lines drawn around the figure giving the impression of movement.
40-name: Joshua Scott, BA (Hons) Fashion Textiles, UCA Rochester
40-alt: In front of a light and dark green animal striped background, six images depicting edited images of tropical foliage are shown, with the highlights of the photos changed to yellow shapes and the shadowns of the photos changes to purple shapes.
41-name: Alma Sivlec Karlin, BA (Hons) Fashion, Edinburgh College of Art
41-alt: In front of a cream background, the torso of a figure is shown wearing a white, black and red coat made from plastic lace designs with an orangey red belt. The figure is standing at a slight angel to the camera, with one hand on their hip.
42-name: Amelia Wang, BA (Hons) Fashion, Edinburgh College of Art
42-alt: On a cream surface, four patches of different coloured and patterened materials are shown in each corner. Images of three androgynous, abstract drawings of figures are overlayed on top of the fabrics, wearing multilayered, dull coloured clothing and colourful headgear.
43-name: Adam Chesworth, BA Fashion Design and Communication, Liverpool John Moores University
43-alt: In front of a grey, white and purple background, three identical, computer generated male figures stand in a line facing the camera. Al lhtree figures wear a futurisic, light purple metal helmet covering the entire face and silver, incomplete body armour on the torso. The figure to the right wears light blue jeans with holes through which light brown fabric comes out. The middle figure wears light, textured trousers with a dark metal section at the top over the hips and lower stomach. The figure to the left wears light grey trousers with brown handprints depicted on them.
44-name: Matthew Hanlon, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, De Montfort University
44-alt: Seven abstract line drawings of models are shown on a white background with an abstract drawing of a catwalk. All of the figures are wearing outfits made in dark blue ink patterns. Four of the figures are shown in the background walking in a line. The other three figures are shown in the foreground close up,
45-name: Nicole Browne, BA (Hons) Fashion Design, De Montfort University
45-alt: Four women are shown standing in a line facing the camera. The model on the furthest right wears a yellow and black pinestripe suit. The model next to hear is wearing a strapless dress with a cream and black striped top and large skirt with a black and light grey skirl pattern on it. The model to the furthest left wears an oversized, cream and black shirt underneath an orange and black zig zag sleeveless jumper. The model next to her is wearing an oversized dark green and black striped blazer over cropped trousers with a red and black swirl pattern. Behind them is a white background with large stickmen drawn in black brushstrokes.
46-name: Sarah Williams, BA (Hons) Fashion, Northumbria University
46-alt: Three abstract figures are shown in front of a white and cream background. One figure is shown kneeling down with one arm on his knee and his hand holding his face, wearing an abstract light grey shirt with dark grey shoulder pads, shirt collar and ruffled cuffs over ruffled dark blue trousers. The figure in the middle wears a sand coloured, sleeveless, misshaped dress over light cream, bootleg trousers. The figure on the left wears light pink sungalsses, a burgundy head scarf and a burgundy full length dress with white and blue swingles underneath an oversized navy suit coat.
47-name: Alexander Neil, BA (Hons) Fashion Design & Marketing, Northumbria University
47-alt: A young man wearing a cream sunhat and a floral pink, green and cream shirt over a cream top stands over the camera looking down. The man is pictured entering the inside of a cream tent with blue sky visible in the background.
